articles.description: The Duchess of Cornwall, 73, used to live in one of the Belgravia flats which could now be knocked down by Hugh Grosvenor's property firm, the Sunday Telegraph reports.
articles.content: Camilla Parker Bowles is said to be saddened by plans to redevelop an apartment block dubbed 'aristo-flats' in Belgravia where she lived in her twenties and entertained Prince Charles after nights ou… [+5193 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: UK downplays risk of EU poaching City of London business - Reuters
articles.description: Britain on Sunday downplayed the risk of the European Union taking business away from the City of London after Brexit, saying the real challenges come from New York, Tokyo and other areas.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
